import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import check from "../../assets/images/check.svg"; import styles from "../../styles/onboard/sign_in.module.scss"; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { registerUser, setLoading, clearMsg } from '../../actions/authActions' import { url } from '../../config' const SignIn = ({ loginUser, setLoading, error_msg, loading, success_msg, user, clearMsg, userToken, }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors, reset } = useForm() useEffect(() => { clearMsg() }, []) if (userToken !== null) { //'/username/dashboard/home' return } const onSubmit = (data) => { setLoading() const userData = { email: data.email, password: data.password, } loginUser(userData, reset) } // const [active, setActive] = useState{false} return( <>
